welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haaren, Netherlands! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city known for its picturesque landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and embrace all that Haaren has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Eindhoven Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport offers a variety of services for travelers including check-in counters, duty-free shops, and restaurants.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport handles all freight and logistics operations, serving as an important hub for the transportation of goods in and out of the Netherlands.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
